duties_responsibilities.duty: Develop and execute comprehensive business strategies to establish and expand a national program for leading segments.
Lead a team of Segment Leaders, providing strategic direction and leadership to support growth plans.
Analyze market trends, customer behavior, and competitor activity to identify growth opportunities and refine strategies.
Manage the company's online presence, activating an operational backbone inclusive of consistent reporting, planning templates, etc., to ensure sales enablement and efficiency.
Plan and execute a sales channel strategy that optimizes coverage, reach, and prospect engagement.
Develop and execute a professional development framework to enhance the skills, knowledge, and capabilities of professionals leading the segments.
Foster a culture of innovation, research, and knowledge creation within the industry.
Foster collaboration and alignment across segments and practice areas and with shared services teams.
Drive operational excellence across the segments, seeking ways to optimize processes and utilize firm tools to produce profitable results for the national segment model.
Set and monitor objectives and key results (OKRs) in alignment with the firm-wide OKRs.

education_certification.credential: Bachelor’s degree in Business, Marketing, Operations, or a related field. Master’s degree preferred.
